name: FlatEarth
0:
”Alexa, ask flat earth if to prove that the earth is flat.”
”Alexa, ask flat earth if the earth is flat.”
”Alexa, ask flat earth why the earth is flat.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: flat earth
des:
Imagine this: You are sitting around the dinner table when all of a sudden your innocent, and frankly naive, guest asks you, "Do you really believe the earth is flat?" 

Rather than explaining it yourself, have Alexa help you educate your guest!

With over one hundred proofs available, just keep asking for new proofs until the ill informed are satisfied. Just add this skill, and ask Alexa to open Flat Earth!

Logo taken from the Flat Earth Society, designed by Blanko, available under CC BY-SA 4.0 (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/) or CC BY-SA 3.0 where necessary (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/).
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
